input: docs/infra/01_monorepo_structure.md: Define monorepo layout: apps/web, apps/mobile, backend/services/*, shared/contracts, shared/utils, ops/; naming conventions, package manager, workspace config.
ops/docker/docker-compose.dev.yml: Local dev compose: postgres, redis, kafka/nats, minio (S3 local), otel-collector; health checks; volume mounts; port mappings.
ops/docker/docker-compose.test.yml: Test environment compose: isolated postgres per suite; ephemeral redis; mock external APIs; auto teardown.
ops/k8s/base/namespace.yaml + resource-quotas.yaml: K8s namespace pzo-prod + pzo-staging; resource quotas; default limits per pod class.
ops/k8s/services/api-gateway-deploy.yaml: Deployment + HPA for api-gateway (Envoy Connect); min 2 replicas; readiness/liveness probes; PodDisruptionBudget.
ops/terraform/main.tf: Terraform root: provider, remote state, module references for networking, db, cache, object-storage, message-bus, cdn.
ops/terraform/modules/database/main.tf: Postgres RDS/Cloud SQL: multi-AZ, read replica, automated backups 7 days, connection pooling (pgBouncer); outputs: connection_string.
ops/terraform/modules/cache/main.tf: Redis ElastiCache/Memorystore cluster mode: 3 shards; eviction policy allkeys-lru; TLS enforced.
ops/terraform/modules/cdn/main.tf: CloudFront/Cloud CDN distribution; Run Explorer pages get long TTL (VERIFIED); OG share images cached separately; signed URLs for private content.
ops/ci-cd/github-actions/build-test.yml: CI pipeline: lint → unit tests → integration tests → coverage gate → docker build → push to ECR/Artifact Registry; gate on coverage % threshold.
ops/ci-cd/github-actions/deploy-staging.yml: Deploy to staging on merge to main: helm upgrade --atomic; smoke test suite; Slack notification on success/fail.
ops/ci-cd/github-actions/deploy-prod.yml: Deploy to prod on release tag: canary 5% → 25% → 100% with automated rollback on error-rate spike; approval gate.

backend/migrations/0001_init_schema.sql: Core tables: users, sessions, devices, device_trust, profiles, account_binds, refresh_tokens; uuid primary keys; created_at/updated_at everywhere; soft delete via deleted_at.
backend/migrations/0002_seasons.sql: seasons, season_membership_types, season_windows (start/end dates); indexes on active season lookup.

backend/migrations/0003_cosmetics.sql: cosmetics catalog, cosmetic_unlocks (user_id, cosmetic_id, source, earned_at); cosmetic_types: badge, frame, banner, title, table_theme, narrator_voice, intro_animation.
backend/migrations/0004_event_store.sql: global_event_store: id, aggregate_id, aggregate_type, event_type, payload_json, metadata_json, version, created_at; hypertable/partition by month.
docs/infra/02_secrets_management.md: Secret rotation policy; Vault/AWS Secrets Manager usage; never-in-env-vars rule; app-level secret references; audit trail.
docs/infra/03_observability_stack.md: OTel tracing → Tempo; metrics → Prometheus → Grafana; logs → Loki; alert routing → PagerDuty; SLO definitions and burn-rate alerting.
ops/grafana/dashboards/platform_overview.json: Platform overview: request rate, p50/p95/p99 latency, error rates, queue depths, DB connections, cache hit rate, pod restart rate.
docs/infra/04_disaster_recovery.md: RPO/RTO targets; DB backup + restore runbook; multi-region failover; runbook for queue replay; event-store recovery procedure.
backend/src/services/auth/index.ts: Auth service boundary: register, login, logout, refresh, guest→account upgrade, platform OAuth (Apple, Google, Discord).
backend/src/services/auth/guest_sessions.ts: Guest session creation with device fingerprint; upgrade path to full account; preserve run history on upgrade; rate-limited per device.
backend/src/services/auth/jwt_service.ts: JWT access tokens (15m TTL) + refresh tokens (30d); rotation on use; revocation list in Redis; device-bound refresh tokens.
backend/src/services/auth/device_trust_service.ts: Device integrity attestation intake (iOS DeviceCheck, Android Play Integrity, web heuristics); trust score computation; threshold policy config.
backend/src/services/auth/oauth_providers.ts: OAuth adapters: Apple Sign In, Google OAuth2, Discord OAuth2; normalize to internal identity; account merge logic on collision.
backend/src/services/auth/auth_service.test.ts: Tests: guest creation, account upgrade preserves runs, JWT expiry/refresh, device trust thresholds, OAuth normalization.
backend/src/middleware/auth_middleware.ts: Express/Connect middleware: verify JWT, attach identity+device_trust to request context; graceful handling of guest vs authed; rate-limit by identity tier.
docs/auth/identity_model.md: Identity model: guest → email/phone bound → platform linked; trust tiers; device trust impact on eligibility; GDPR/CCPA deletion path.

docs/game/01_core_loop_spec.md: Core loop definition: Choose Goal → Choose Profile → 8–12 turns (card + decision) → Resolve outcomes → After Action → Queue next run. Rules for 12-minute target runtime.
docs/game/02_seeded_determinism_spec.md: Seed generation rules; run_seed structure; PRNG algorithm selection (xorshift64 recommended); replay encoding format; seed commitment before run starts.
shared/contracts/game/run_contract.ts: RunState, TurnState, PlayerBalance, AssetRegister, DebtRegister, StatusEffects, DeckState, RunOutcome, RunLifecycleEvent types.
shared/contracts/game/card_contract.ts: CardDefinition, CardEffect, EffectOp enum (CASH_ADD, BURN_ADD, ASSET_ADD, DEBT_ADD, STATUS_ADD, DRAW, CHOICE, ROLL, IF_HAS, CHAIN), DeckDefinition.

shared/contracts/game/profile_contract.ts: PlayerProfile: name, startingCash, burnRate, obligations[], riskTolerance, startingAssets[], specialRules[]; built-in profiles: single_parent, gig_worker, high_income_high_burn, immigrant_startup, corporate_employee.
backend/src/game/engine/index.ts: Game engine boundary: CreateRun, SubmitTurnDecision, FinalizeRun, ReplayRun; all state transitions deterministic from seed + ledger.
backend/src/game/engine/seed_generator.ts: Seed generation: run_id → seed commitment; combine player_id, timestamp, nonce; produce reproducible PRNG sequence; store seed_commit on run creation.
backend/src/game/engine/card_effects_executor.ts: Execute CardEffect ops against RunState; all ops are pure functions (RunState, CardEffect) → RunState; no side effects; ROLL uses seeded PRNG.
backend/src/game/engine/deck_manager.ts: Deck draw from seeded sequence; separate draw pools for FUBAR/OPPORTUNITY/MISSED_OPPORTUNITY/PRIVILEGED/SO; weighted draws; shuffle on seed.
backend/src/game/engine/turn_resolver.ts: Resolve a turn: draw cards, apply auto-effects, present choices, apply player decision, compute deltas, emit TurnEvent; validate against ruleset.
backend/src/game/engine/run_finalizer.ts: Finalize run: compute outcome (SURVIVED/CASHFLOW_COLLAPSE/CASCADING_FUBAR/FORCED_LIQUIDATION/CREDIT_FREEZE); emit RUN_FINALIZED event; enqueue verification.
backend/src/game/engine/replay_engine.ts: Replay from seed + event log; reproduce exact run state at any turn; output must be byte-identical to original; used by verifier.
backend/src/game/engine/engine_determinism.test.ts: 1000-seed fuzz test: replay each seed twice; assert byte-identical output; zero tolerance for non-determinism.
backend/src/game/engine/card_effects.test.ts: Unit tests for all 15 EffectOp types; boundary conditions; chained effects; IF_HAS branching; ROLL seeding.
docs/game/03_effects_dsl_reference.md: Complete DSL reference for card authors: all EffectOps with examples, constraints, budget impact, and test patterns.
backend/src/game/engine/run_orchestrator.ts: Orchestrator: manage run lifecycle from CREATE through FINALIZE; coordinate engine + event store + replay; enforce turn time limits; handle disconnects.

backend/src/game/engine/after_action_generator.ts: Generate AfterAction: failure_mode enum, strength_mode enum, replay_suggestion (scenario that trains weakness), one_tiny_action, one_medium_action; uses run event log.
backend/src/game/modes/solo_mode.ts: Solo run configuration: 8–12 turns, single player balance sheet, daily challenge integration, personal goal tracking.
backend/src/game/modes/household_mode.ts: Household (co-op) mode: 2–4 players, shared macro state, per-player balance sheet, table events (SO/Privileged/MacroShift), bail-out + syndicate mechanics.
backend/src/game/modes/ghost_run_mode.ts: Ghost run (async PvP): serialize opponent run decisions as ghost; player races ghost with same seed variant; weekly leaderboard integration.
backend/migrations/0010_runs.sql: runs, run_turns, run_events (append-only), run_outcomes, run_goals, run_profiles; seed_commit stored on creation; foreign keys to users/sessions.
backend/migrations/0011_cards.sql: card_definitions, card_versions (immutable), deck_definitions, deck_compositions, ruleset_versions; content_hash per version; publish/retire lifecycle.
docs/game/04_game_modes_spec.md: Solo / Household / Ghost / Episode modes; UX entry flows; session management; reconnect handling; max players per mode.

docs/content_ops/01_content_service_spec.md: Content service scope: card definitions, deck compositions, scenario packs, ruleset versions; immutable versioning; feature-flag rollout; content_hash per version.
backend/src/services/content/index.ts: Content service: GetCard, GetDeck, GetScenario, GetRuleset, ListActiveScenarios, PublishCardVersion, RetireCard; all reads are versioned + cacheable.
backend/src/services/content/version_registry.ts: Immutable version registry: content_hash = sha256(content_json); version pins per deployed ruleset; backward compatibility guarantees for replays.

backend/src/services/content/feature_flag_rollout.ts: Feature-flag-gated content rollout: card goes to 5% players → 25% → 100%; kill switch reverts immediately; no replays broken by mid-rollout reverts.

backend/src/services/content/episode_manager.ts: Episode (scenario pack) management: episode DRAFT → VALIDATED → LIVE → RETIRED; episode metadata (title, difficulty, macro_rule, unlock_requirement); season placement.

backend/src/services/content/daily_challenge_service.ts: Daily challenge service: seeded daily scenario assigned globally; same seed for all players; tracks global completion rate; produces daily leaderboard.
backend/src/services/content/card_authoring_api.ts: Internal card authoring API: create/edit card in DSL format; preview simulation against 50 seeded runs; compute balance budget; submit for review.

backend/migrations/0012_content_versions.sql: content_versions (id, type, content_json, content_hash, status, published_at, retired_at); content_rollout_flags; content_pin_registry per ruleset_version.

backend/src/services/content/live_macro_shock_service.ts: Live Macro Shock: subscribe to macro_event_feed (Fed rate, unemployment, housing); generate MacroShockCard from event; broadcast to all active games via game event bus; severity threshold config.
docs/content_ops/02_card_authoring_guide.md: Card authoring guide: DSL syntax, EffectOp reference, balance budget limits, test patterns, review checklist, version pinning, retirement process.
docs/content_ops/03_episode_launch_runbook.md: Episode launch runbook: author → validate → sandbox test → balance check → feature flag → launch; rollback procedure; player communication template.

docs/content_ops/04_season_model.md: Season model: Season 1 Stability → Season 2 Leverage → Season 3 Crash → Season 4 Recovery → Season 5 Empire; per-season card sets, story arcs, league ladders, prizes; content calendar skeleton.

docs/balance/01_balance_console_spec.md: Balance console spec: win-rate per profile, death-cause distribution, most-lethal-cards ranking, most-overpowered-deal ranking, avg time-to-first-asset, retention by scenario pack.
backend/src/services/balance_analytics/index.ts: Balance analytics boundary: GetProfileWinRates, GetDeathCauseDistribution, GetCardDangerRanking, GetDealStrengthRanking, GetSessionMetrics.
backend/src/services/balance_analytics/win_rate_aggregator.ts: Aggregate win/loss by profile_id + scenario_id + ruleset_version; rolling 7d/30d windows; detect drift vs baseline.

backend/src/services/balance_analytics/death_cause_analyzer.ts: Aggregate run_outcomes by failure_mode; cross-reference with card_id at decisive turn; produce 'most lethal card' + 'turn 5 death spike' signals.

backend/src/services/balance_analytics/card_impact_scorer.ts: Score every card's average delta to RunState (cash change, survival correlation, player frustration proxy); rank by 'net danger' and 'net overpowered'.

frontend/apps/web/app/(admin)/balance/page.tsx: Balance console dashboard: profile win-rate chart, death-cause donut, card danger table, deal strength table, retention-by-scenario heatmap; filter by date range + ruleset version.

backend/src/services/balance_analytics/difficulty_curve_validator.ts: Validate difficulty curve of a scenario: expected turn-by-turn stress distribution; flag if too lethal early or too easy late; emit balance_alert event.

backend/migrations/0030_balance_analytics.sql: balance_snapshots (profile_id, scenario_id, ruleset_version, win_rate, death_causes_json, computed_at); card_impact_scores; deal_strength_scores; daily rollup.
ops/grafana/dashboards/balance_console.json: Balance dashboard: win rate trends per profile, lethal card heat map, difficulty curve charts, deal equity distribution, balance drift alerts.

docs/balance/02_tuning_runbook.md: Balance tuning runbook: how to adjust card weights, deck compositions, profile starting states; A/B test procedures; rollback process; communication to players on major rebalances.

docs/share_engine/01_share_engine_spec.md: Auto-clip capture spec: 5s before moment, decision frame, 5s after reaction; vertical 1080x1920 export; moment classification triggers; captions overlay format.
shared/contracts/share/share_contract.ts: ShareableArtifact types: BalanceSheetCard, CauseOfDeathCard, DealFlipCard, RegretCard, ProofCard, ClipMoment; OG metadata shape.
backend/src/services/share_engine/index.ts: Share engine boundary: GenerateShareCard, RequestClipCapture, GetShareArtifact, GetOGMeta.

backend/src/services/share_engine/share_card_renderer.ts: Server-side OG card rendering (Satori/Puppeteer): templates for BalanceSheet, CauseOfDeath, DealFlip, Regret; branded; proof-stamped when verified.
backend/src/services/share_engine/moment_classifier.ts: Classify share moments from run events: Opportunity_Flip, FUBAR_Death, Missed_Bag, Survival; confidence score; top 3 moments per run.

backend/src/services/share_engine/clip_capture_service.ts: Queue clip capture jobs triggered on moment classification; store clip metadata (run_id, moment_type, turn_range, status); CDN upload on completion.

backend/src/services/share_engine/og_meta_service.ts: Dynamic OG meta per run: /run/{runId}/share → og:image, og:title, og:description; verification status reflected in meta; cache VERIFIED runs aggressively.

frontend/apps/web/src/features/share/DealFlipCard.tsx: 'Deal Flip' share card: deal name, cash delta, outcome; victory tone; branded; shareable.
frontend/apps/web/src/features/share/BalanceSheetCard.tsx: 'My Balance Sheet' card: final state snapshot; minimal + branded; works as identity artifact.
backend/migrations/0020_share_artifacts.sql: share_artifacts, share_cards_rendered, clip_jobs (status, cdn_url, run_id, moment_type); og_cache (run_id, rendered_at, image_url).
backend/src/services/share_engine/moment_classifier.test.ts: Tests for moment classification: known run fixtures → expected moment types + confidence scores; no false positives on neutral turns.
docs/share_engine/02_viral_challenge_mechanics.md: Point Zero One Challenge spec: 5 friends, $20 buy-in format, tag system, stitching mechanics, account aggregator hooks, weekly trend injection.
ops/grafana/dashboards/share_engine.json: Share metrics: share cards generated/day, clip capture queue depth, OG cache hit rate, viral coefficient by moment type, top performing share templates.

docs/after_action/01_after_action_spec.md: After Action Plan spec: failure_mode taxonomy, strength_mode taxonomy, one_tiny_action library (100+ entries), one_medium_action library, replay_suggestion algorithm.

shared/contracts/after_action/after_action_contract.ts: AfterAction: failure_mode, strength_mode, what_killed_you (narrative), what_saved_you, one_tiny_action, one_medium_action, replay_suggestion_scenario_id, free_resources[].

backend/src/services/after_action/failure_mode_classifier.ts: Classify failure mode from run_outcome + event log: SPENDING_LEAKAGE / NO_RESERVES / BAD_DEBT / NO_DEAL_FLOW / CASCADING_FUBAR / CREDIT_FREEZE; confidence score.
backend/src/services/after_action/action_recommender.ts: Map failure_mode → one_tiny_action + one_medium_action from curated library; personalized by profile type; never prescriptive guarantees.
backend/src/services/after_action/replay_suggester.ts: Suggest a scenario that trains the detected weakness; match failure_mode → scenario_ids with high training signal; rank by novelty to player.

frontend/apps/web/src/features/after_run/AfterActionPlan.tsx: After Action Plan UI: animated reveal sequence; failure_mode badge; 3-step actions; replay CTA; toggle for Reality Layer explanations (never forced).

backend/src/services/after_action/failure_mode_classifier.test.ts: Tests for all 6 failure modes against fixture run logs; assert correct classification + fallback to CASCADING_FUBAR when ambiguous.

backend/migrations/2026_02_20_add_run_explorer_read_model.sql: Add run_explorer_public read model table with run_id, proof_hash, status, summary_json, pivots_json, ruleset_hash, deck_version, visibility, created_at, verified_at.

backend/src/services/run_explorer_api/rate_limit_and_abuse.ts: Add rate limiting + IP bucketing for public explorer lookups; different buckets for Pending vs Verified; safe error messaging.

docs/release/01_closed_alpha_spec.md: Closed Alpha: content harvest phase; let players break the game; collect share clips; identify lethal cards + dead metas; refine tutorial until conversion measurably high; alpha invite mechanics; feedback capture pipeline.

docs/release/02_soft_launch_spec.md: Soft Launch: limited regions/platforms; A/B tests (onboarding/run length/pricing tiers/difficulty curves); retention lab mode; tune first 3 sessions to be addictive; success criteria for global launch.

docs/release/03_global_launch_spec.md: Global Launch: Season 1 episode arc; daily challenge; creator/influencer toolkits; referral codes; community leagues; 'launch is a season not a date' operational model; Day 1 comms calendar.

docs/release/04_ab_test_matrix.md: A/B test matrix: onboarding length (3 steps vs 5 steps), run length (8 turns vs 12 turns), after-action timing (immediate vs 1-turn delay), pricing CTA placement, Season Pass price points ($7/$12/$19); success metrics per test.

backend/src/services/feature_flags/ab_test_service.ts: A/B test service: assign cohort on first session; sticky assignment (same user always in same variant); emit AB_TEST_ENROLLED event; track conversion metrics per variant; automated winner detection.

docs/release/05_tutorial_spec.md: Tutorial spec: first run arc (3 turns guaranteed to survive to build confidence); 5-second tooltips only (no pauses); skip available after tutorial 1; convert 80%+ players to second run within session.

backend/src/services/tutorial/tutorial_orchestrator.ts: Tutorial orchestrator: FirstRunMode with curated seed + guaranteed survival for 3 turns; track tutorial completion; emit TUTORIAL_COMPLETED; unlock full game on completion; A/B tested variants.

docs/b2b/01_corporate_wellness_dashboard_spec.md: Corporate Wellness Dashboard spec: employer provides seat access; aggregated anonymized data (% survive cashflow scenarios, common failure modes, risk literacy score distribution); refine financial education programs; HIPAA-adjacent privacy architecture.

docs/b2b/02_pricing_model.md: B2B pricing: Base $5k/year up to 500 seats; Enterprise $25k/year unlimited + custom scenarios; Industry Risk Pack consulting $50k+; hosted private leagues add-on; facilitator dashboard add-on; renewal discount structure.

docs/b2b/03_onboarding_playbook.md: B2B onboarding playbook: contract → provisioning → admin setup → seat assignment (CSV/SSO) → facilitator training → launch event (company-wide 'First Run Night') → 30/60/90 day success metrics.

backend/src/services/b2b/b2b_tenant_service.ts: B2B tenant service: CreateTenant, ProvisionSeats, AssignSeat, RevokeSeat, GetTenantAnalytics; SSO (SAML/OIDC) integration; tenant data isolation; audit log all provisioning actions.

backend/src/services/b2b/wellness_analytics_service.ts: Wellness analytics: compute org-level survival rates, failure mode distribution, risk literacy score; aggregate anonymized (min-K=10 privacy threshold); produce reports on-demand; export CSV/PDF.

frontend/apps/web/app/(institution)/institution/wellness/page.tsx: Corporate wellness dashboard: org-level risk literacy gauge, failure mode donut, survival rate trend, employee participation rate, custom scenario performance; export report button.

docs/b2b/04_industry_risk_packs_spec.md: Industry Risk Pack spec: custom scenario packs for healthcare/tech/manufacturing/education; scenario themes match industry financial risks; $50k+ consulting engagement; approval by content ops team.

docs/b2b/05_privacy_compliance_posture.md: B2B privacy posture: no individual PII in analytics exports; aggregation threshold; data residency options; DPA template; CCPA/GDPR compliance notes; FERPA posture for schools; recommended counsel review points.

docs/b2b/06_sales_playbook.md: B2B sales playbook: ICP (employers 200+ employees with HR/benefits budget, schools with financial literacy mandate, churches with stewardship program); discovery questions; objection handling; proof-of-concept template; close checklist.

docs/security/01_threat_model.md: Threat model: replay manipulation, run result fabrication, account takeover, B2B data exfiltration, biometric data leak, prompt injection into card forge NLP; mitigations per threat; residual risk acceptance.

docs/security/02_split_brain_auth_architecture.md: Split-brain security: game simulation service has no direct write access to economy/identity; separate authZ contexts; API gateway enforces; no prompt injection vector into card DSL from user input.

backend/src/middleware/input_sanitizer.ts: Input sanitizer middleware: sanitize all user text inputs before NLP or card DSL processing; block DSL injection attempts in card forge; log sanitization events for anomaly detection.

docs/security/03_penetration_test_scope.md: Pen test scope: auth flows, run replay API, economy purchase flows, B2B tenant isolation, biometric consent bypass attempts; schedule quarterly; remediation SLA per severity.

docs/security/04_coppa_ferpa_posture.md: COPPA/FERPA posture: age gate for players under 13; parental consent flow; no behavioral ads; school data under FERPA when using curriculum license; no selling student data; counsel review required before launch.
ops/security/dependabot.yml: Dependabot config: weekly dependency audits for all packages; auto-PR for security patches; block deploys if critical CVEs unresolved; alert on new high/critical CVEs.

ops/testing/e2e_smoke_suite.ts (Playwright): E2E smoke: user registers, plays first run, receives After Action, shares proof card, verifies proof, accesses leaderboard; runs on every deploy to staging.
ops/testing/determinism_fuzz_test.ts: Determinism fuzz: 10,000 random seeds; replay each twice; assert byte-identical output; zero tolerance; runs nightly; alert on any failure.

ops/testing/economy_invariant_tests.ts: Economy invariants: never_win_advantage for all purchasable items; entitlement grants never touch game_engine; B2B seat grants never affect personal ladder; run on every deploy.
ops/testing/load_test_k6.js: Load test (k6): 10,000 concurrent solo runs; verification queue under load; leaderboard reads under load; target p95 < 500ms for all game APIs under peak; run weekly.

docs/quality/01_definition_of_done.md: Definition of Done checklist: unit tests passing, integration tests passing, e2e smoke passing, determinism test passing, economy invariant test passing, security scan clean, docs updated, OPS dashboard updated, rollback plan documented.

ops/testing/privacy_compliance_tests.ts: Privacy compliance tests: no PII in public explorer read model, biometric data not stored beyond consent window, B2B exports redact individuals below K threshold, GDPR deletion removes all user data in < 30 days.
